name: Justice Fairy
description:
Everybody knows that at the end of the rainbow. There are goblins guarding a big pot of gold, but have you ever wondered what happens should they decide to just take the gold for themselves? Pixel Fairy is a fun little plattformer in which you will be tasked to go after the goblins and return the gold to the rainbow.

A - Move Left 

D - Move Right

J - Dash

Space - Jump

Special thanks to:
